transmissions.title: p1Austin Powers in Goldmember
transmissions.description: Austin Powers returns, this time travelling back to the 70s to rescue his imperilled father with the help of Foxxy Cleopatra, and then back to the present day to stop Dr Evil and his new partner Goldmember from taking over the world.

transmissions.title: p1Maverick
transmissions.description: A gambler trying to raise the necessary stake to enter a championship poker game is joined by a wily adventuress who is also headed for the championship, but the pair must overcome a series of obstacles before they get to the game's riverboat venue.

transmissions.title: p1This Is the End
transmissions.description: Cabin fever and dwindling supplies threaten to tear apart six friends who are trapped in a house together after cataclysmic events devastate Los Angeles.

transmissions.title: p1Life
transmissions.description: When a smart-talking con artist and a serious would-be bank teller are thrown together to commit a crime, they are wrongly accused of murder. Sentenced to `life' in an infamous Mississippi farm prison they continually try to escape, despite the friction in their chalk-and-cheese relationship.

transmissions.title: p1Casting Couch
transmissions.description: Six guys come up with the ultimate hookup plan: Create a fake casting call for a movie, then audition gorgeous women who are willing to do whatever it takes to win a part.

transmissions.title: p1Eddie Murphy Raw
transmissions.description: An unexpurgated, outrageous, feature-length performance by the comic, who makes a triumphant return to the stand-up stage with a show recorded at the Felt Forum, New York City.

transmissions.title: p1Good Burger
transmissions.description: When Mondo Burger sets up across the street, sneaky Dexter and burger-obsessed Ed realise they need to fight to keep their fast food joint going. Their new secret sauce might be the answer, but not if Mondo can grab it.

transmissions.title: p1Back to the Future Part II
transmissions.description: Time-travel sequel with Marty McFly and the eccentric inventor Doc Brown travelling back and forth in time to stop their nemesis tampering with history. By stealing the time machine and travelling back in time himself, Biff Tannen gives his younger self a book containing fifty years of sports statistics which he uses to amass an enormous gambling fortune and power.

transmissions.title: p1The Marine 3: Homefront
transmissions.description: Sgt Jake Carter returns home and discovers his sister has been abducted by violent extremists. Jake launches a one-man assault on the group's base of operations and discovers the terrorists are plotting a deadly strike.

transmissions.title: p1The Karate Kid Part III
transmissions.description: A boy trained in the martial arts is alienated from his mentor just when he needs to prepare for a showdown with his arch-enemy. Instead, he turns to a Vietnam vet who teaches him how to fight dirty - a strategy the youth comes to realise is a mistake.

transmissions.title: p1Battleship
transmissions.description: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

transmissions.title: p1Lethal Weapon 3
transmissions.description: Murtaugh is only days away from retirement when he and Riggs, along with officer Lorna Cole, are assigned to track down a crooked ex-cop who is supplying huge consignments of guns to gangs.

transmissions.title: p1Back to the Future Part III
transmissions.description: Marty McFly travels to the American Wild West of 1885 in a desperate bid to save Doc Brown from becoming another victim of a black-hatted gunslinger.

transmissions.description: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt.

The jet is placed on an aircraft carrier in the Pacific to learn combat manoeuvres from the human pilots aboard, but when the computer develops a mind of its own, it's the humans who are charged with stopping it before it incites a war.
